Piratini, October 18, 1838.

Most Illustrious Sir,

I acknowledge receipt of your official letter of the 17th of the current month, and I am informed of its content. I ask Your Excellency Joaquim Pereira Fagundes, Chief of Police of this Department, to proceed with the payment for the goods recently purchased for the army.

God preserve Your Excellency,
